hero.title: Real companionship for the ones who matter most
hero.subtitle: Connect your loved ones with verified companions for day-to-day activities. Every visit gets recorded on blockchain for total transparency.

silver.title: For the Silver (senior)
silver.point1: Zero apps, just your paper wallet with QR codes
silver.point2: Your companion scans it at the start of each visit
silver.point4: Every visit gets logged automatically on-chain

companion.title: For the companion
companion.point2: Get gigs or pick up available paper wallets
companion.point3: Scan the QR when you start each session
companion.point4: Earn NFTs and rewards for your work

payer.title: For the payer/donor
payer.point1: Buy paper wallets with real traceability
payer.point2: Give it to family or donate to someone in need
payer.point4: Everything's recorded on blockchain for transparency

web3Trust.title: Built with trust tech
web3Trust.subtitle: The care journey for your loved one

verified.title: Verified companions
verified.desc: Every companion goes through a rigorous vetting process before they can offer services.

traceability.title: Total traceability
traceability.desc: Every visit gets recorded immutably on blockchain, giving you complete transparency.

privacy.title: Privacy guaranteed
privacy.desc: Personal data stays protected while service traceability remains verifiable.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Recording
blockchain.desc: Every companion session gets recorded as an immutable transaction on the blockchain, creating a tamper-proof verifiable history.

nft.title: NFTs as Certificates
nft.desc: Companions receive unique NFTs that certify their work, creating a transferable and verifiable on-chain reputation.

identity.title: Identity Verification
identity.desc: We use proof-of-personhood tech to ensure every companion is a real and unique person on the platform.

gift.title: Meaningful gift
gift.desc: Gift real companionship to your loved ones, especially if you live far away. Each paper wallet is loaded with verified visits that truly make a difference.

donate.title: Donation with impact
donate.desc: Donate paper wallets to foundations and social programs. Every visit gets recorded on-chain for max transparency.

corporate.title: Corporate program
corporate.desc: Integrate Companya paper wallets into your employee or insured benefits program. Wellness with full traceability.

login.subtitle: Connect your Web3 wallet to access your dashboard

login.secureAccessDesc: Your wallet is your verified identity on the network
login.autoNftsDesc: Each session generates a reputation NFT
login.immutableHistoryDesc: All your work is recorded on blockchain
